thread.section_title: Soho Grand Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very Soho...
thread.title_full: Very Soho... - Review of Soho Grand Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: BcMc_11
title: Very Soho...
text: The doormen here are standout. Charming, witty and all round great guys. The welcome at reception is significantly cooler. Rooms are good value for the area and the bathrooms are fab with really nice amenities. One of the best mini bars I've seen with products that you actually want to eat. We were there in winter but would be gorgeous on the rooftop bar in warmer months.
